JobFullDesc: About the Role As a Frontend Engineer, you’ll work on the code behind apps used by millions globally every day. In hundreds of cities, people tap their phones to get a ride, get food delivered, or earn extra cash with Uber. We’re looking for hardworking engineers to make sure every one of those experiences is magical. Join us to work on some of the most exciting challenges in tech. Basic QualificationsBachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experienceTwo (2) years of experience coding with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related web technologiesExperience in web frontend development experience with modern JavaScript tooling (React, Redux or equivalent, and so on) Preferred QualificationAt least five (5) years of software engineering experienceExperience working with react or node.js applicationsExperience with unit and integration testingGood written, verbal communication skillsGreat team player
